00025 /*! \file ylmgen_c.h
00026  *  Code for efficient calculation of Y_lm(phi=0,theta)
00027  *
00028  *  Copyright (C) 2005-2011 Max-Planck-Society
00029  *  \author Martin Reinecke
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef PLANCK_YLMGEN_C_H
00033 #define PLANCK_YLMGEN_C_H
00034 
00035 #include "sse_utils.h"
00036 
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 extern "C" {
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 typedef double ylmgen_dbl2[2];
00042 typedef double ylmgen_dbl3[3];
00043 
00044 typedef struct
00045   {
00046   double cth_crit;
00047   int mdist_crit;
00048   /* members depending on m and m' */
00049   int s, m, mlo, mhi, cosPow, sinPow;
00050   long double prefactor;
00051   ylmgen_dbl3 *fx;
00052   int preMinus_p, preMinus_m;
00053   } sylmgen_d;
00054 
00055 typedef struct
00056   {
00057   double fsmall, fbig, eps, cth_crit;
00058   int lmax, mmax, m_cur, ith, nth, m_crit, spinrec;
00059   /*! The index of the first non-negligible Y_lm value. */
00060   int *firstl;
00061   double *cf, *mfac, *t1fac, *t2fac, *th, *cth, *sth, *logsth;
00062   ylmgen_dbl2 *recfac;
00063   double *lamfact;
00064   /*! Points to an array of size [0..lmax] containing the Y_lm values. */
00065   double *ylm;
00066   /*! Points to an array of size [0..lmax] containing the lambda_w
00067       and lambda_x values for spin>0 transforms. */
00068   ylmgen_dbl2 **lambda_wx;
00069   long double *logsum, *lc05, *ls05;
00070   double *flm1, *flm2, *xl;
00071 
00072   sylmgen_d **sylm;
00073 
00074   int *lwx_uptodate;
00075   int ylm_uptodate;
00076 
00077 #ifdef PLANCK_HAVE_SSE2
00078   int ith1, ith2;
00079   /*! Points to an array of size [0..lmax] containing the Y_lm values. */
00080   v2df *ylm_sse2;
00081   /*! Points to an array of size [0..lmax] containing the lambda_w
00082       and lambda_x values for spin>0 transforms. */
00083   v2df2 **lambda_wx_sse2;
00084   int *lwx_uptodate_sse2;
00085   int ylm_uptodate_sse2;
00086 #endif
00087 
00088   int recfac_uptodate, lamfact_uptodate;
00089   } Ylmgen_C;
00090 
00091 /*! Creates a generator which will calculate Y_lm(theta,phi=0)
00092     up to \a l=l_max and \a m=m_max. It may regard Y_lm whose absolute
00093     magnitude is smaller than \a epsilon as zero. If \a spinrec is nonzero,
00094     the spin-1 and spin-2 Y_lm will be calculated by recursion from the spin-0
00095     ones, otherwise Wigner d matrix elements will be used. */
00096 void Ylmgen_init (Ylmgen_C *gen, int l_max, int m_max, int spinrec,
00097    double epsilon);
00098 
00099 /*! Passes am array \a theta of \a nth colatitudes that will be used in
00100     subsequent calls. The individual angles will be referenced by their
00101     index in the array, starting with 0.
00102     \note The array can be freed or reused after the call. */
00103 void Ylmgen_set_theta (Ylmgen_C *gen, const double *theta, int nth);
00104 
00105 /*! Deallocates a generator previously initialised by Ylmgen_init(). */
00106 void Ylmgen_destroy (Ylmgen_C *gen);
00107 
00108 /*! Prepares the object for the calculation at \a theta and \a m. */
00109 void Ylmgen_prepare (Ylmgen_C *gen, int ith, int m);
00110 
00111 /*! Recalculates (if necessary) the Y_lm values. */
00112 void Ylmgen_recalc_Ylm (Ylmgen_C *gen);
00113 /*! Recalculates (if necessary) the lambda_w and lambda_x values for spin >0
00114     transforms. */
00115 void Ylmgen_recalc_lambda_wx (Ylmgen_C *gen, int spin);
00116 
00117 #ifdef PLANCK_HAVE_SSE2
00118 /*! Prepares the object for the calculation at \a theta, \a theta2 and \a m. */
00119 void Ylmgen_prepare_sse2 (Ylmgen_C *gen, int ith1, int ith2, int m);
00120 
00121 /*! Recalculates (if necessary) the Y_lm values. */
00122 void Ylmgen_recalc_Ylm_sse2 (Ylmgen_C *gen);
00123 /*! Recalculates (if necessary) the lambda_w and lambda_x values for spin >0
00124     transforms. */
00125 void Ylmgen_recalc_lambda_wx_sse2 (Ylmgen_C *gen, int spin);
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 /*! Returns a pointer to an array with lmax+1 entries containing normalisation
00129     factors that must be applied to Y_lm values computed for \a spin with the
00130     given \a spinrec flag. The array must be deallocated (using free()) by the
00131     user. */
00132 double *Ylmgen_get_norm (int lmax, int spin, int spinrec);
00133 
00134 /*! Returns the maximum spin quantum number supported by the Ylmgen code. */
00135 int Ylmgen_maxspin(void);
00136 
00137 #ifdef __cplusplus
00138 }
00139 #endif
00140 
00141 #endif
